GSD.description:
binder: fix UAF of ref->proc caused by race condition

This is an automated ID intended to aid in discovery of potential security vulnerabilities. The actual impact and attack plausibility have not yet been proven.
This ID is fixed in Linux Kernel version v5.10.142 by commit 9629f2dfdb1dad294b468038ff8e161e94d0b609. For more details please see the references link.
